title: Cindy Manifest
description: Schema for .cindy/manifest.json â€” the change manifest used by the Cindy agentic CI/CD protocol.

revision.description: Revision counter. Starts at 1, increments with each resubmission.

responds_to.description: Review ID this revision addresses. Null for first submission.

subjects_affected.description: Event subjects affected by this change.

schema_changes.description: Schema modifications included in this change.

consumers.description: Downstream consumers of the affected subjects.

depends_on.description: Branch names this change depends on being deployed first.

type.description: Whether this extends an existing subject or introduces a new one.

fields_added.description: New fields added to the schema.

fields_removed.description: Fields removed from the schema. Must be empty for safe changes.

fields_modified.description: Fields with type changes. Must be empty for safe changes.
